citances.sentence: This judgment should be read together with: the initial judgment dealing with the liability of the respondents: Duxbury v Pierce [2009] FCA 367 ; and the appeal judgment dealing with the liability of the respondents concerning the first applicant: Duxbury v Pierce [2009] FCAFC 164.
